name: Ackrayl: The Resurrection
description:
This Game is made for the Mini Jame Gam #10.

STORY:

YOU SURVIVED AN ACCIDENT BUT GOT UNCONSCIOUS. WHEN YOU WOKE UP UP FOUND YOURSELF IN AN UNKNOWN AREA OF THE FOREST.

NOW EXPLORE THE FOREST AND FIND A WAY OUT.

AND REMEMBER NOT TO WAKE HIM UP.......

CREDITS:

MADE BY KICK14

MUSIC IN LMMS

ART IN PHOTOSHOP

ENGINE USED : RENPY

IF YOU HAVE ANY PROBLEMS COMPLETING THE GAME PLEASE DO ASK.

>You need to interact with icons to move forward in the game

>make use of map if you feel stuck

>mansion gate not opening? Remember "TRY TRY BUT DON'T CRY". ;)

;)
